text: David Raskin (June 15, 1943 â€“ August 16, 2022), was an American blues guitarist and singer-songwriter. He was known as the voice of the "Sonny Eclipse" animatronic at Cosmic Ray's Starlight Cafe at Walt Disney World's Magic Kingdom. Raskin died on August 16, 2022 at the age of 79. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American blues singers Category:American blues musicians Category:American guitarists Category:Singer-songwriters from Chicago Category:Musicians from Chicago Category:Actors from Chicago Category:American voice actors
